item.description:
THIS IS A MIDNIGHT SHOW
As AMC 19/Lowes tries to catch up on the Limited release films, lets give them a chance and see TTW at midnight. You have to see at least one midnight show during the summer!
The Time Traveler's Wife Opens Friday, August 14, 2009 | Runtime:1 hr. 48 min. PG-13thematic elements, brief disturbing images, nudity and sexuality Chicago librarian Henry De Tamble suffers from a rare genetic disorder that causes him to drift uncontrollably back and forth through time. On one of his sojourns, he meets the love of his life, Claire (Rachel McAdams), and they marry. But the problems and complexities of any relationship are multiplied by Henry's inability to remain in one time and place, so that he and his beloved are forever out of sync. Fandango Features: Watch the latest The Time Traveler's Wife trailer in HD!
Cast: Rachel McAdams, Eric Bana Director: Robert Schwentke Genres: Romantic Drama, Drama, Supernatural Drama

item.name: The Time Traveler's Wife
